sense.gloss: staying somewhere else (overnight), spending the night away (e.g. from home), going home (e.g. from hospital) for the night, sleepover

sdata.j: ↑外泊↑↓|がいはく|↓してもいいですか。

sdata.e: It is dark out of doors.

sdata.j: ↑父↑↓ちち↓は↑外泊↑↓|がいはく|↓するときはたいてい↑帽子↑↓ぼうし↓をかぶる。
sdata.e: My father usually wears a hat when he goes out for the night.
